EmailTemplate.name: Initial_Order_Disp_Qty_Changed
EmailTemplate.subject: ACTION: Additional Dispenser Added for Install {!FS_Initial_Order__c.FS_Installation__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: An initial order has already been sent for this installation but there has been a change in the number of dispensers. Please process an order if needed for the additional dispenser(s) for ({!FS_Initial_Order__c.FS_Installation__c}).
